subject: Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
body:
Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
 Dear Customer
This is to notify you that we are presently rounding up for the end of the Final Financial Quota 2023.
 It is important that you confirm to us your readiness to receive your approved amount this financial Quota by indicating your choice of payment that will be convenient for you.
Subsequent to the above , we request that you reconfirm your banking details , current mailing address and direct mobile/ whatsapp numbers to facilitate the transfer release process.
We shall upon the receipt of  the aforementioned details forward to you the Transfer  Confirmation receipt of the telegraphic transfer to your designated bank within 24hrs.
Looking Forward to your immediate response.
Katie Murray
Chief Financial Officer
NatWest Bank London United Kingdom

subject: Re:   Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
body:
Hello Katie Murray,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm excited about the prospect of receiving my approved amount this financial quota. However, I would like to know more about the choices of payment that are available to me. Could you please provide more details on this?

Also, I understand that you need some information from me to facilitate the transfer release process. While I am eager to proceed, I am also cautious about sharing personal information online due to security reasons. Is there a secure way we can handle this?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Caroline

subject: Re: Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
body:
Dear Caroline ,

Thank you for your detailed mail .

All contents noted.

Be advised that in NatWest Bank London United Kingdom , We have over 900
branches in the United Kingdom and worldwide.

Our main aim is to protect our customer’s funds, investment with our
international credibility and  reputation and competence .

Subsequent to the above , our professional staff ‘s will be ready at all
time to serve you .

It is important you are informed that your security and your privacy is
assured and we shall be liable for any breach of agreement .

However , We at the  NatWest  Bank London United Kingdom  have concluded
the payment approval process.

Be advised that will be offering you the beneficiary Two (2) option’s of
payment .

 Kindly choose from the options below  and fill the enclosed transfer
application  form

1. TELEGRAPHIC TRANSFER

 2. AUTOMATED TELLER MACHINE CARD

We shall upon receipt of your response commence the credit  process of your
choice within  24hrs.

Please note that I have enclosed your approval documents for your perusal
and record purposes

 Thanks for your anticipated cooperation .

Treat as Urgent

Signed

Katie Murray

Chief Financial Officer

NatWest Bank  London United Kingdom

subject: Re: Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
body:
Hello Katie Murray,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information. It's great to know that Bank London United Kingdom has such a wide network of branches and prioritizes customer security.

I'm intrigued by the two payment options you've mentioned - TRANSFER and AUTOMATED TELLER MACHINE CARD. Could you please provide more details about these? Specifically, I'd like to understand how each option works, any associated fees, and the time it would take for the funds to be available.

Also, I didn't find any approval documents attached to your email. Could you please resend them?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Caroline

subject: Re: Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
body:
Dear Caroline ,

Be advised that there are bank related charges involved in the release of
the funds to the beneficiary.

All financial transactions are regulated by the The Financial Conduct
Authority London United Kingdom.

The Financial Conduct Authority is a financial regulatory body in the
United Kingdom which operates independently of the UK Government and is
financed by charging fees to members of the financial services industry.

All approval documents will be sent to you upon the receipt of the filled
form to ensure that we are dealing with a rightful beneficiary.

Kindly treat as urgent and fill the form to facilitate the process

Katie Murray

subject: Re: Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
body:
Hello Katie Murray,

Thank you for your message. It's interesting to learn about the role of The Financial Conduct Authority in regulating financial services in the UK. I appreciate your guidance on this matter.

Could you please provide more details about these bank-related charges? How are they calculated and what do they cover exactly? Also, could you explain a bit more about the approval documents that will be sent upon receipt of the filled form?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Caroline

subject: Re: Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
body:
Dear Caroline ,

All contents noted.

Fund of Origin Certificate

Tax  Clearance

Fund Clearance Certificate

Statement of Account

Agreement between the Beneficiary and the bank

Revenue and Customs Clearance .

Authority to Remit

Bill of Clean Report

The aforementioned are some of the documents to be issued to the
beneficiary.

Caroline, I must confess that I am very busy this morning and  with the
following I believe I have cleared you on your request .

Katie

subject: Re: Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
body:
Hello Caroline,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate the detailed list of documents you've provided. It's quite comprehensive and it seems like a lot of work has been put into this.

I'm curious, could you please explain more about what each document is for? For instance, what exactly is the 'Fund of Origin' and 'Tax Clearance'? Also, how does the 'Authority to Remit' work?

I must admit that I'm not very familiar with these terms and would love to understand them better. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Caroline

subject: Re: Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
body:
Dear Caroline,

THE FUND OF ORIGIN is the Clearance that the fund is clean and not drug
related or money laundering .
Tax Clearance is that fund has been cleared of the British Taxation System.

The Authority to remit is the Authorization for the bank to pay the
beneficiary within 24hrs.

Katie

subject: Re: Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
body:
Hello Caroline,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's really helpful to understand these terms better. So, if I'm understanding correctly, the Fund of Origin is a sort of certification that the money is legitimate and not associated with any illegal activities like drug trafficking or money laundering, correct?

And the Tax Clearance means that all necessary taxes on the funds have been paid in accordance with British law? That's quite interesting.

Lastly, the Authority to Remit is essentially permission for the bank to transfer or pay out the funds? 

I appreciate your patience in explaining these things to me. I'm always eager to learn more about such processes.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Caroline

subject: Re: Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
body:
I AM KATIE MURRAY NOT CAROLINE .

FILL THE FORM AND SEND BACK

subject: Re: Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm not quite sure what form you're referring to. Could you please provide more details about it? What is the purpose of this form and where can I find it?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Caroline

subject: Re: Attn :Concerned Beneficiary
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm curious about the information you've shared. Could you please provide more details? I'd love to understand better.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Caroline
